snippet: After being abused and stalked by her children’s father, Kim Lemon got help to protect her family and became a better mother along the way.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Kim Lemon protect her family from their abusive father and to learn how to become a better mother.
